overview: A wide-open road... A warm, dusty breeze... And a girl who can't say no. For country girl Bree Olsen and friends, living out the American dream means a never-ending highway of erotic encounters. Their sweet thighs spread out like one long, lazy summer afternoon after another. It's a place where time slows down, where sex smells of fresh-cut hay, and desire stretches as far as the eye can see. Anything can happen on Sunshine Highway.
title: Sunshine Highway
